page.title: 17A Somerleyton Farm
page.content: On the 12th June 1985, a few children went on a farm visit with Mrs Prettyman When we got out of the car, we heard dogs barking. Then, Mr. Flatt showed us some geese. There were four geese in one field. In another field was one goose with three goslings that were two and a half weeks old. There were 44 cows on the farm, along with a donkey called Polo and a horse called Goldie. There are lots of wild rabbits in the fields. Later we saw a grain pit and were shown how it worked. We had a walk in a sugar beet field and a walk in a wheat field where we were all given a piece of wheat.
